data.message:
Hey I have a request, My ACCOUNT was closed for a while cause i don,t give a nub and my pages was unpublished,Now I added a number in my i.d and pages are not publish-ing again 
   Now what i suppose to do  to publish my pages :) ?

replies.message: Hi Samad. If you need help deleting or deactivating and old account, you can report it to us. If you lost access to an old account because it's hacked, you can request help recovering it. Learn more: https://www.facebook.com/help/231208473756221 -Chantal
